summary: App with admin panel for managing sarees and a user panel for displaying them. Currently investigating a bug where sarees added in the admin panel are not reflected in the user panel.
architectural_notes: App has an admin panel for uploading/managing sarees and a user panel for displaying them
known_issues: Sarees added in the admin panel show as uploaded but do not appear/update in the user panel

existing_features.title: After a saree is successfully added or updated in the admin panel (AdminSarees.tsx), the React Query cache for the saree catalog must be invalidated so the user-facing Catalog page (Catalog.tsx) immediately reflects the new or updated saree without requiring a manual page refresh.

Audit the saree list query in useQueries.ts to ensure it fetches fresh data from the backend when the cache is invalidated, and that the query key is consistent between AdminSarees.tsx and Catalog.tsx so cache invalidation works correctly across both pages.

Ensure that saree images uploaded via the admin panel (stored as blobs in the backend) are correctly fetched and rendered in the user-facing Catalog page after a cache invalidation, so newly added sarees display their images and not a broken/empty image placeholder.
